imigani:28:22: 22.Umuntu w’ishyari ashakana ubukungu ubwira,Kandi ntamenye yuko ubukene buzamugeraho.
imigani:28:23: 23.Ucyaha umuntu hanyuma azashimwa,Kuruta ufite ururimi rushyeshya.
imigani:28:24: 24.Uwiba se cyangwa nyina maze akavuga ati “Si icyaha”,Uwo ni mugenzi w’umurimbuzi.
imigani:28:25: 25.Ufite umutima w’ubusambo abyutsa intonganya, Ariko uwiringira Uwiteka azahaga bimubyibushye.
imigani:28:26: 26.Uwiringira umutima we ubwawo ni umupfapfa,Ariko ugendera mu bwenge azakizwa.
imigani:28:27: 27.Uha abakene ntazakena, Ariko ubirengagiza azahaga imivumo myinshi.
imigani:28:28: 28.Iyo abanyabyaha babyutse abantu barihisha,Ariko iyo barimbutse abakiranutsi baragwira.
imigani:29:1: 1.Ucyahwa kenshi agashinga ijosi,Azavunagurika atunguwe nta kizamukiza.
imigani:29:2: 2.Iyo abakiranutsi bagwiriye abantu barishima,Ariko iyo hategeka umunyabyaha abantu bacura imiborogo.
imigani:29:3: 3.Ukunda ubwenge anezeza se, Ariko ubana n’abamaraya yiyaya ibintu bye.
imigani:29:4: 4.Umwami akomeresha igihugu imanza zitabera,Ariko uhongesha aragitsinda.
imigani:29:5: 5.Umuntu ushyeshya umuturanyi we, Aba asa nk’uteze amaguru ye ikigoyi.
imigani:29:6: 6.Mu gicumuro cy’umunyabyaha harimo umutego ategewemo, Ariko umukiranutsi arishima akavuza impundu.
imigani:29:7: 7.Umukiranutsi azi urubanza rw’abakene, Ariko umunyabyaha nta bwenge afite bwo kurumenya.
imigani:29:8: 8.Abakobanyi bakongeza umudugudu imivurungano, Ariko abanyabwenge bahosha uburakari.
imigani:29:9: 9.Umunyabwenge iyo agiye impaka n’umupfapfa, Naho yarakara cyangwa agaseka ntabwo zakoroha.
imigani:29:10: 10.Abakunda kwicana banga intungane, Kandi n’umukiranutsi bashaka uko bamwica.
imigani:29:11: 11.Umupfapfa agaragaza uburakari bwe bwose, Ariko umunyabwenge arifata akabucubya.
imigani:29:12: 12.Iyo umutware yumviye amazimwe, Abagaragu be bose baba abanyabyaha.
imigani:29:13: 13.Umukene n’urenganya amahuriro yabo ni amwe, Uwiteka ahwejesha amaso ya bombi.
imigani:29:14: 14.Umwami ucira abakene imanza zitabera, Ingoma ye izakomera iteka ryose.
imigani:29:15: 15.Umunyafu no gucyaha byigisha ubwenge, Ariko umwana bandaritse akoza nyina isoni.
imigani:29:16: 16.Iyo abanyabyaha bagwiriye, Ibicumuro na byo biragwira, Ariko abakiranutsi bazabitegereza bahenebera.
imigani:29:17: 17.Hana umwana wawe azakuruhura, Ndetse azanezeza umutima wawe.
imigani:29:18: 18.Aho guhishurirwa kutari abantu bigira ibyigenge, Ariko ukomeza amategeko aba ahirwa.
imigani:29:19: 19.Ikiretwa ntigihanishwa amagambo, N’iyo kiyumvise ntikiyitaho.
imigani:29:20: 20.Mbese wabonye umuntu uhuta amagambo? Bakwemera umupfapfa kumurutisha uwo.
imigani:29:21: 21.Umugaragu warezwe neza uhereye mu bwana bwe,Hanyuma azabera shebuja umwana.
imigani:29:22: 22.Umunyamujinya abyutsa intonganya, Kandi umuntu w’inkazi agwiza ibicumuro.
imigani:29:23: 23.Ubwibone bw’umuntu buzamucisha bugufi, Ariko uwicisha bugufi mu mutima azabona icyubahiro.
imigani:29:24: 24.Uwiyuzuza n’umujura aba yiyanga, Yumva uko arahizwa akanga kubivuga.
imigani:29:25: 25.Gutinya abantu kugusha mu mutego,Ariko uwiringira Uwiteka azaba amahoro.
imigani:29:26: 26.Benshi bashaka gutona ku mutware,Ariko Uwiteka ni we ucira abantu imanza.
imigani:29:27: 27.Ukiranirwa azirana n’abakiranutsi, Kandi ugenda ari intungane azirana n’abanyabyaha.
imigani:30:1: Imigani ya Aguri1.Amagambo ya Aguri mwene Yake y’ubuhanuzi. Uwo mugabo abwira Itiyeli ndetse Itiyeli na Ukali ati
imigani:30:2: 2.“Ni ukuri ndi umuntu umeze nk’inka kurusha abandi bose, Simfite kujijuka nk’umuntu,
imigani:30:3: 3.Kandi sinize ubwenge, Simenya n’Uwera uwo ari we.
imigani:30:4: 4.Ni nde wazamutse mu ijuru kandi akamanuka?Ni nde wateranyirije umuyaga mu bipfunsi bye?Ni nde wapfunyitse amazi mu mwambaro we?Ni nde washinze impera zose z’isi?Izina rye ni nde,kandi izina ry’umwana we ni nde niba uyazi?
imigani:30:5: 5.“Ijambo ry’Imana ryose rirageragezwa,Ni yo ngabo ikingira abayihungiyeho.
imigani:30:6: 6.Ntukagire icyo wongēra ku magambo yayo,Kugira ngo itagucyaha ugasanga uri umunyabinyoma.
imigani:30:7: 7.“Nagusabye ibintu bibiri, Ntubinyime umwanya nkiriho.
imigani:30:8: 8.Nkuraho ibitagira umumaro n’ibinyoma bimbe kure, Ntumpe ubukene cyangwa ubukire, Ahubwo ungaburire ibyokurya binkwiriye,
imigani:30:9: 9.Kugira ngo ndahaga nkaguhakana nti ‘Uwiteka ni iki?’ Cyangwa nkaba umukene nkiba, Nkagayisha izina ry’Imana yanjye.
imigani:30:10: 10.“Ntukabeshyere umugaragu kuri shebuja, Kugira ngo atakuvuma ugatsindwa n’urubanza.
imigani:30:11: 11.“Hariho umuryango w’abantu bavuma ba se, Kandi ntibahe ba nyina umugisha.
imigani:30:12: 12.Hariho umuryango w’abantu biyita intungane, Kandi batuhagiweho imyanda yabo.
imigani:30:13: 13.Hariho umuryango w’abantu, Bariya bagira amaso y’ubwibone, Ijisho barikura mu gihene.
imigani:30:14: 14.Hariho umuryango w’abantu bafite amenyo ameze nk’inkota n’ibijigo bimeze nk’ibyuma, Byo gutsemba abakene mu isi n’indushyi ngo bazikure mu bantu.
imigani:30:15: 15.“Umusundwe ufite abakobwa babiri bataka bati ‘Mpa, mpa!’ Hariho ibintu bitatu bitagira igihe bihaga, Ndetse ni bine bitavuga biti ‘Birahagije’:
imigani:30:16: 16.Imva, inda itabyara, isi idahaga amazi, N’umuriro utavuga ngo ‘Mpaze inkwi.’
imigani:30:17: 17.“Ijisho ry’useka se akanga kumvira nyina, Rizanogorwa n’ibikōna byo mu bikombe, Kandi ibyana by’ibisiga bizarimira.
imigani:30:18: 18.“Hariho ibintu bitatu bitangaza bindengaho, Ndetse ni bine ntazi:
imigani:30:19: 19.Ubugenge bw’igisiga mu kirere, Ubugenge bw’inzoka ku rutare, Ubugenge bw’inkuge mu nyanja hagati, N’ubugenge bw’umugabo ku nkumi.
imigani:30:20: 20.“Ni ko ubugenge bw’umugore wa maraya bumeze, Ararya akiyunyuguza, Maze akavuga ati ‘Nta kibi nakoze.’
imigani:30:21: 21.“Hariho ibintu bitatu bitigisa isi, Ndetse ni bine itabasha kwihanganira:
imigani:30:22: 22.Umugaragu iyo ahindutse umwami, Umupfapfa iyo aguye ivutu,
imigani:30:23: 23.Umugore w’igicamuke iyo atashye mu nzu, N’umuja iyo azunguye nyirabuja.
imigani:30:24: 24.“Hariho ibintu bine biba ku isi bitoya, Ariko bifite ubwenge bukabije:
imigani:30:25: 25.Ibimonyo ni ubwoko budakomeye, Ariko byibikira ibyokurya mu cyi.
imigani:30:26: 26.Impereryi ni ubwoko butagira imbaraga, Ariko ziyubakira amazu mu bitare.
imigani:30:27: 27.Inzige ntizigira umwami, Ariko zitera zigabanyijemo imitwe.
imigani:30:28: 28.N’umuserebanya ufatisha amaboko yawo, Ariko uba no ku nyumba z’abami.
imigani:30:29: 29.“Hariho ibintu bitatu bifite imigendere myiza, Ndetse ni bine bigenda neza cyane:
imigani:30:30: 30.Intare irusha izindi nyamaswa zose amaboko, Kandi ntigira icyo ihunga.
imigani:30:31: 31.Ifarashi y’intambara n’isekurume y’ihene, Kandi n’umwami utagira abamugomera.
imigani:30:32: 32.“Niba wakoze iby’ubupfapfa ukishyira ejuru, Cyangwa niba wagambiriye ibibi, Wifate ku munwa.
imigani:30:33: 33.Gucunda amata kuresa amavuta, Guhotora izuru kuvusha amaraso, Ni ko gutera uburakari kuzana intonganya.”
imigani:31:1: Inama Umwami Lemuweli yahawe1.Amagambo y’umwami Lemuweli n’ubuhanuzi nyina yamwigishije:
imigani:31:2: 2.“Mwana wanjye, ndakubwira iki? Ese nkubwire iki, mwana wanjye nibyariye,Ko ari wowe nahigiye?
imigani:31:3: 3.Ntugahe abagore intege zawe n’ubugingo bwawe, Kuko ari cyo kigusha abami.
imigani:31:4: 4.“Ntibikwiriye abami, Lemuweli we, Abami ntibakwiriye kunywa vino, Cyangwa ibikomangoma kubaririza ibisindisha aho biri.
imigani:31:5: 5.Be kunywa bakibagirwa ibyategetswe, Bakagoreka imanza z’abarengana.
imigani:31:6: 6.Ibisindisha ubihe ugiye gupfa, Na vino uyihe ufite intimba mu mutima.
imigani:31:7: 7.Mureke anywe urwo rushungandushyi, Rumutere kwibagirwa intimba ye.
imigani:31:8: 8.“Bumbura akanwa kawe uvugire ikiragi, Kandi uburanire abatagira shinge na rugero.
imigani:31:9: 9.Bumbura akanwa kawe uce imanza zitabera, Ucire abakene n’indushyi urubanza rutunganye.”
imigani:31:10: Ishimwe ry’umugore ufite umutima10.Umugore w’imico myiza ni nde wamubona? Arusha cyane rwose marijani igiciro.
imigani:31:11: 11.Umutima w’umugabo we uhora umwiringira, Kandi ntazabura kunguka.
imigani:31:12: 12.Ahora amugirira neza ntabwo amugirira nabi, Igihe cyose akiriho.
imigani:31:13: 13.Ashaka ubwoya bw’intama n’imigwegwe, Anezezwa no gukoresha amaboko ye.
imigani:31:14: 14.Ameze nk’inkuge z’abagenza, Azana ibyokurya bye abikura kure.
imigani:31:15: 15.Abyuka kare butaracya, Akagaburira abo mu rugo, Agategeka abaja be imirimo ibakwiriye.
imigani:31:16: 16.Yitegereza umurima akawugura, Awutezamo urutoki mu by’inyungu ivuye mu maboko ye.
imigani:31:17: 17.Akenyerana imbaraga, Agakomeza amaboko ye.
imigani:31:18: 18.Abona yuko ibyo akora bimufitiye akamaro, Kandi nijoro itabaza rye ntirizima.
imigani:31:19: 19.Afatisha ukuboko urubambo ruriho ipamba, Intoki ze zigafata igiti ahotoza.
imigani:31:20: 20.Aramburira abakene ibiganza, Kandi indushyi akazitiza amaboko.
imigani:31:21: 21.Ntatinyisha abo mu rugo igihe cy’imbeho, Kuko abo mu rugo bose bambaye ibikomeye by’imihemba.
imigani:31:22: 22.Yibohera ibirago by’ibisuna, Imyambaro ye ni imyenda y’ibitare byiza n’imihengeri.
imigani:31:23: 23.Umugabo we amenyekana mu marembo y’umudugudu, Yicaranye n’abakuru b’igihugu.
imigani:31:24: 24.Aboha imyambaro akayigura, Agurira abagenza imikandara.
imigani:31:25: 25.Imbaraga n’icyubahiro ni byo myambaro ye, Kandi igihe kizaza azaba agiseka atacyitayeho.
imigani:31:26: 26.Abumbuza akanwa ke ubwenge, Kandi itegeko ry’ururimi rwe riva ku rukundo.
imigani:31:27: 27.Amenya neza imico yo mu rugo rwe, Kandi ntabwo arya ibyokurya by’ubute.
imigani:31:28: 28.Abana be barahaguruka bakamwita Munyamugisha, N’umugabo we na we aramushima ati
imigani:31:29: 29.“Abagore benshi bagenza neza, Ariko weho urabarusha bose.”
imigani:31:30: 30.Ubutoni burashukana kandi uburanga bwiza ni ubusa, Ariko umugore wubaha Uwiteka ni we uzashimwa.
imigani:31:31: 31.Mumuhe ku mbuto ziva mu maboko ye, Kandi imirimo ye nibayimushimire mu marembo.
